casebody.data:
HOFECKER
v.
CASPERSON. No. 92A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 11, 2005. Robert J. Harris, for David L. Hofecker.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of March 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Jonathan & Gary Casperson) shall have up to and including the 14th day of March 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.

*132By order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of March 2005."
